abstract: Nigerian soccer goalie Tejiri Rhiogbere is banned from all African matches for year after spitting on assistant referee during African Confederation Cup match.
lead_paragraph: Tejiri Rhiogbere was barred for a year from all African competitions for spitting at an assistant referee during an African Confederation Cup match.

headline.print_headline: Nigerian Player Banned for Spitting on Official

snippet: Tejiri Rhiogbere was barred for a year from all African competitions for spitting at an assistant referee during an African Confederation Cup match.
